DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety and efficacy of lixivaptan in the treatment of hyponatremia in patients with congestive heart failure.
DOC.brief_title: THE BALANCE Study: Treatment of Hyponatremia Based on Lixivaptan in NYHA Class III/IV Cardiac Patient Evaluation
DOC.criteria: Male and female patients 18 years of age or older with hyponatremia and hospitalized for congestive heart failure.
